channel.title: Need Server Help
channel.description:
I recently made my second server, and is having tons of problems.
[size=13pt]1. Connections Issues[/size] Im pretty sure I portfowarded right, but heres the settings I used.
Service Name ~ RsPriivateServer Service Type ~ TCP Starting Port ~ 43594 Ending Port ~ 43594 And the Ip is private. Im using a Netgear WGR614v7.
I have run.bat open, and No-Ip. Yet no one can connect to it but me.
Due to the second question not having to do with server problems, Heres the link to it in "Client Help" [code]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,389016.0.html[/code]
But I really need help with that, since untill I fix it I cant play on any server.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 11:11:24 pm[/size][hr]...

item.title: Need Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Micker Micker
item.description:
@Micker wrote:

I recently made my second server, and is having tons of problems.

[size=13pt]1. Connections Issues[/size]
Im pretty sure I portfowarded right, but heres the settings I used.

Service Name ~ RsPriivateServer
Service Type ~ TCP
Starting Port ~ 43594
Ending Port ~ 43594
And the Ip is private. Im using a Netgear WGR614v7.

I have run.bat open, and No-Ip. Yet no one can connect to it but me.

Due to the second question not having to do with server problems, Heres the link to it in “Client Help”

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,389016.0.html

But I really need help with that, since untill I fix it I cant play on any server.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 11:11:24 pm[/size][hr]…
